title: Understanding the Range
text: First, identify the fruits that weigh between $$1.5$$ kg and $$3$$ kg. Count how many fruits fall within this range.

title: Total Number of Fruits
text: Determine the total number of fruits in the dataset. This will help you calculate the percentage.

title: Calculate the Percentage
text: Use the formula: (Number of fruits in range / Total number of fruits) * $$100$$ to find the percentage.

title: Simplify the Fraction
text: If the fraction is $$\frac{3}{5}$$, simplify it to 60%.
